import React from 'react'; import { Row, Col, Nav } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { ReadOnlyText } from "../../components/App.styles"; import { FormGroup, FormLabel } from "react-bootstrap"; import { injectIntl } from 'react-intl'; import { rearrangeDateFormatDateOnly } from "../../components/CommonScript"; import { intl } from "../../components/App"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faTrashAlt, faPencilAlt, faThumbsUp, faUserTimes, faCloudDownloadAlt, faCheckCircle, faEye } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; const AddProjectInfoPreview = (props) => { return ( <> {props.intl.formatMessage({ id: "IDS_PROJECTTITLE" })} {props.selectedProjectMaster.sprojecttitle} {props.intl.formatMessage({ id: "IDS_PROJECTCODE" })} {props.selectedProjectMaster.sprojectcode} {props.intl.formatMessage({ id: "IDS_PROJECTNAME" })} {props.selectedProjectMaster.sprojectname} {props.intl.formatMessage({ id: "IDS_ROLE" })} {props.selectedProjectMaster.suserrolename} {props.intl.formatMessage({ id: "IDS_INCHARGE" })} {props.selectedProjectMaster.susername} {/* {props.intl.formatMessage({ id: "IDS_CLIENTADDRESS" })} {props.selectedQuotation.sclientsiteaddress} */} {/* {props.intl.formatMessage({ id: "IDS_INVOICEADDRESS" })} {props.selectedQuotation.sinvoiceaddress} */} {props.intl.formatMessage({ id: "IDS_RFWDATE" })} {rearrangeDateFormatDateOnly(props.userInfo, props.selectedProjectMaster.srfwdate)} {props.intl.formatMessage({ id: "IDS_STARTDATE" })} {rearrangeDateFormatDateOnly(props.userInfo, props.selectedProjectMaster.sprojectstartdate)} {props.intl.formatMessage({ id: "IDS_EXPECTEDPROJECTCOMPLETIONDATE" })} {rearrangeDateFormatDateOnly(props.userInfo, props.selectedProjectMaster.sexpectcompletiondate)} {props.intl.formatMessage({ id: "IDS_CLIENTCATEGORY" })} {props.selectedProjectMaster.sclientcatname} {props.intl.formatMessage({ id: "IDS_CLIENT" })} {props.selectedProjectMaster.sclientname} {props.intl.formatMessage({ id: "IDS_QUOTATIONNO" })} {props.selectedProjectMaster.squotationno === null || props.selectedProjectMaster.nquotationcode === -1 ? "-" : props.selectedProjectMaster.squotationno} {props.intl.formatMessage({ id: "IDS_RFWID" })} {props.selectedProjectMaster.srfwid === null ? "-" : props.selectedProjectMaster.srfwid} {props.intl.formatMessage({ id: "IDS_PROJECTDURATION" })} {props.selectedProjectMaster.sprojectduration} {props.intl.formatMessage({ id: "IDS_PROJECTDESCRIPTION" })} {props.selectedProjectMaster.sprojectdescription} {/* { props.selectedProjectMaster.sapprovedate!=null? {props.intl.formatMessage({ id: "IDS_PROJECTAPPROVEDDATE" })} {props.selectedProjectMaster.sapprovedate!=null? rearrangeDateFormatDateOnly(props.userInfo,props.selectedProjectMaster.sapprovedate) :"-"} :"" } */} {((props.selectedProjectMaster.sfilename != null) && (props.selectedProjectMaster.sfilename != "-")) ?
{props.intl.formatMessage({ id: "IDS_CLOSUREFILENAME" })} {props.selectedProjectMaster.sfilename === null ? "-" : props.selectedProjectMaster.sfilename} {props.selectedProjectMaster.sfilename != null ? props.viewProjectMasterClosureFile(props.selectedProjectMaster, props.userInfo)}> : ""} : ""} {/* {((props.selectedProjectMaster.sprojectcompletiondate!="-" && props.selectedProjectMaster.sprojectcompletiondate!=null) || (props.selectedProjectMaster.scompletionremarks!=null && props.selectedProjectMaster.scompletionremarks!="-"))?
{props.intl.formatMessage({ id: "IDS_PROJECTCOMPLETEDDATE" })} {rearrangeDateFormatDateOnly(props.userInfo,props.selectedProjectMaster.sprojectcompletiondate)} {props.intl.formatMessage({ id: "IDS_REMARKS" })} {props.selectedProjectMaster.scompletionremarks===null?"-":props.selectedProjectMaster.scompletionremarks} :"" } */} {/* {((props.selectedProjectMaster.sprojectretiredate!="-" && props.selectedProjectMaster.sprojectretiredate!=null)|| (props.selectedProjectMaster.sretiredremarks!="-" && props.selectedProjectMaster.sretiredremarks!=null))?
{props.intl.formatMessage({ id: "IDS_RETIREDATE" })} {rearrangeDateFormatDateOnly(props.userInfo,props.selectedProjectMaster.sprojectretiredate)} {props.intl.formatMessage({ id: "IDS_REMARKS" })} {props.selectedProjectMaster.sretiredremarks===null?"-":props.selectedProjectMaster.sretiredremarks}
:"" } */} /* { {props.intl.formatMessage({ id: "IDS_ROLE" })} {props.selectedQuotation.suserrolename} } */ /*{ {props.intl.formatMessage({ id: "IDS_INCHARGE" })} {props.selectedQuotation.susername} }*/ /* { {props.intl.formatMessage({ id: "IDS_PROJECTTYPE" })} {props.selectedQuotation.sprojecttypename} {props.intl.formatMessage({ id: "IDS_PROJECTTITLE" })} {props.selectedQuotation.sprojecttitle} {props.intl.formatMessage({ id: "IDS_PROJECTCODE" })} {props.selectedQuotation.sprojectcode} {props.intl.formatMessage({ id: "IDS_RFWDATE" })} {rearrangeDateFormatDateOnly(props.userInfo,props.selectedQuotation.srfwdate)} }*/ /*{ {props.intl.formatMessage({ id: "IDS_ROLE" })} {props.selectedQuotation.suserrolename} } */ ); } export default injectIntl(AddProjectInfoPreview);
